email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN STAR (DWT: 85000, LOA: 220m) available for your steel coils shipment from Rotterdam to Shanghai. The cargo size is 12,000 MT on CIF terms. Our starting freight quote is USD 45/MT. The laycan is 25-30 October. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do USD 40/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
Michael Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your response. I can offer USD 42/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

USD 42/MT works for us. Can we adjust the laycan to 27 October - 1 November? Also, please send the recap of terms.

Best regards,
Michael Lee

email_chain.subject: Recap of Terms - Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Please find the recap below:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN STAR
- Cargo: 12,000 MT Steel Coils
- Load Port: Rotterdam
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Laycan: 27 October - 1 November
- Freight Rate: USD 42/MT
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm if everything is correct.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap of Terms - Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The recap looks good. Please proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Michael Lee
